definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
lit. 300 silver taels not hidden here (idiom); fig. to reveal what one intends to hide
pinyin: ci3 di4 wu2 yin2 san1 bai3 liang3

sentences.english: Still, who are we to say that we can stay?
sentences.chinese: 然而，誰有敢說我們能長留此地？

sentences.english: These faults make the goods quite unsalable in this market.
sentences.chinese: 這些缺陷使得產品在此地市場很難銷售。

sentences.english: Thee island lies south by east from here.
sentences.chinese: 那個島位於此地的正南偏東方向。

sentences.english: Described in the book of songs for "a roll here, o the wind from the south" drifting.
sentences.chinese: 《詩經》中描述此地爲“有卷者阿，飄風自南”。

sentences.english: At present, they are visiting all parts of the country. They will be arriving here tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 目前他們正在全國各地巡迴上演，今天就要抵達此地。

sentences.english: Famine here is very serious. The government has already given out relieving grain to this area.
sentences.chinese: 此地糧荒嚴重，政府已經在調撥救濟糧了。

sentences.english: Plus, of course, Central America, which has remained steadfastly pro-Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 當然，還有中美洲，此地仍然堅定的支持臺灣。

sentences.english: Experience the city's grungier side by exploring this region which is refreshingly down to earth.
sentences.chinese: 通過探尋此地完完全全的真實面來體驗城市的骯髒面。

sentences.english: I have to take the Yellow Crane to spare here, Yellow Crane Tower.
sentences.chinese: 昔人已乘黃鶴去，此地空餘黃鶴樓。

sentences.english: We did a lot of leafleting in the area.
sentences.chinese: 我們在此地散發了許多傳單。

sentences.english: The king of the country was a little old hunchback man.
sentences.chinese: 此地的國王是一個駝背小老頭。

sentences.english: It holds also one of the most complete successions of the Cambrian strata known in China.
sentences.chinese: 此地同樣也是我國寒武系地層出露最完整的地區之一。

sentences.english: In the time for a leaf to fall in one place, a flower could bloom in another.
sentences.chinese: 此地一片樹葉飄下的工夫，彼地一朵花盛開了。

sentences.english: Heaven and hell exist here and now, within your own mind.
sentences.chinese: 天堂和地獄此時此地存在你的思想裏。

definition: Dragon mountain/Longshan district of Liaoyuan city 遼源市|辽源市, Jilin/Longshan county in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1]
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
